text: Gulbuddin Hekmatyar (; born 1 August 1949) is an Afghan politician. He was a mujahideen leader. He is the founder and current leader of the Hezb-e-Islami Gulbuddin political party. He was the Prime Minister twice during the 1990s. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Afghanistan Category:Kabul University alumni Category:20th- century Afghan people
title: Gulbuddin Hekmatyar
